ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD makes readers suffer for Keanu Reeves' sins in a spoof of the hellish Constantine. MAD also enables video game addicts, provokes the battle of kids vs. parents and discovers the play-by-play's the thing with William Shakespeare, sports commentator.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:06:44. [Issue ID 129285]
